data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Dushanbe with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dushanbe, Tajikistan

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Dushanbe, Tajikistan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Dushanbe.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 470 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Deaf people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Deaf people know you.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Dushanbe to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 680,000 citizens of the the state of Dushanbe.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 677,137 who are far from you in Dushanbe, Tajikistan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Dushanbe
location.people_groups_list: Lak, Arab, Tajiki, Parsee, Bashkir, Ghami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lak (2,100), Arab, Tajiki (1,400), Parsee (2,600), Bashkir (8,400), Ghami (31,000)
